subject: Dakar Rally
Terrorism
lead_paragraph: The Dakar Rally, the motorcycle, car and truck race across the Sahara, was canceled Friday by organizers citing “direct” threats of terrorism from a militant group linked to Al Qaeda.
snippet: The Dakar Rally, the motorcycle, car and truck race across the Sahara, was canceled Friday by organizers citing “direct” threats of terrorism from a militant group linked to Al Qaeda.
